text: Volleyball at the 2005 Southeast Asian Games logo Volleyball at the 2005 Southeast Asian Games consisted of indoor volleyball held at the West Negros University Gymnasium in Bacolod, Negros Occidental, Philippines and beach volleyball held at the University of St. La Salle Grounds also in Bacolod. Volleyball at the SEA Games was split into two categories: the traditional volleyball competition and beach volleyball. ==Medal winners== {| |- |Men's Indoor | | | |- |Women's Indoor | | | |- |Men's beach | Andy Ardiyansah Rama Supriadi | Koko Prasetyo Darkuncoro Agus Salim | Sonthi Bunrueang Borworn Yungtin |- |Women's beach | Kamoltip Kulna Jarunee Sannok | Yupa Phokongploy Usa Tenpaksee | Heidi Illustre Diane Pascua |} ==Details== ===Indoor Volleyball=== ====Men's Finals==== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" width=35% |- !rowspan=2; colspan=2|Country||colspan=5|Score |- !1||2||3||4||Total |- |Thailand|| Thailand||23||25||25||25||align="right"|98 |- |Indonesia|| Indonesia||25||21||19||18||align="right"|83 |- |} ====Women's Finals==== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" width=30% |- !rowspan=2; colspan=2|Country||colspan=5|Score |- !1||2||3||4||Total |- |Thailand|| Thailand||25||25||25|| ||align="right"|75 |- |Vietnam|| Vietnam||20||10||20|| ||align="right"|50 |- |} ===Beach Volleyball=== ====Men's Finals==== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" width=45% |- !rowspan=2; colspan=2|Country||rowspan=2|Name||colspan=4|Score |- !1||2||3||Final |- |align="center"| Indonesia||INA||Andy Supriadi||17||21||15||align="right"|2 |- |align="center"| Indonesia||INA||Koko Agusalim||21||16||12||align="right"|1 |- |} ====Women's Finals==== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" width=40% |- !rowspan=2; colspan=2|Country||rowspan=2|Name||colspan=4|Score |- !1||2||3||Final |- |align="center"| Thailand||THA||Kamoltip Jarunee||21||21|| ||align="right"|2 |- |align="center"| Thailand||THA||Yupa Usa||12||19|| ||align="right"|0 |- |} ==External links== *Southeast Asian Games Official Results Category:2005 Southeast Asian Games events Category:2005 in volleyball Category:Volleyball at the Southeast Asian Games
